addOptionalInfo: Dodaj opcjonalne informacje, które zostaną opublikowane
frmAffiliated: Jestem powiązany (np. właściciel; przyjaciele / rodzina właściciela; tam pracuję)
frmAgreeTerms: Zgadzam się z Warunkami Świadczenia Usług *
frmAgreeLicense: Zgadzam sie na opublikowanie mojej opinii, włączając w to dane osobiste które podałem opcjonalnie, zgodnie z otwartą licencją (CC-BY-4.0), oraz zgadzam się z Polityką Prywatności *
signInNew: New here? Post your first review to create an account with the posted information.
signInReturning: If you already have an Open Reviews account, or if you would like to switch to another Open Reviews account, you can

frmFlag.title: Flagging a review
frmFlag.info:
Thank you for flagging up inappropriate reviews. Reviews that violate the Terms of Service will be removed from the dataset. Low-quality reviews will remain in the dataset, but will have a reduced influence on the overall rating.
Please indicate up to 3 reasons why you are flagging this review as inappropriate:
frmFlag.typeTerms: Violation of the Terms of Service
frmFlag.reason01: The review contains offensive language that is violent, unlawful, coarse, sexist, racist, accusatory, or defamatory
frmFlag.reason02: The review contains personal information that could be used to track, identify, contact or impersonate someone
frmFlag.reason03: The review violates someone else's intellectual property, privacy/confidentiality, or personality rights
frmFlag.reason04: The review is marketing or spam
frmFlag.reason05: The review is on the wrong subject profile
frmFlag.reason06: The content doesn't mention a buying or service experience and is solely ethical, political or value-laden opinion

popupHeader: Thank you for leaving an Open Review and helping others have better experiences!
popupContent: You can save your password (secret key) to use the same account on different platforms that work with Open Reviews . Just paste this password when you leave your next review in log in section.
